comments:
When trying out content assist in Variables View's detail pane, using 
Ctrl+Space got the following error message:

"The command for the key you pressed failed"

Invoking content assist from the context menu has no effect.

Same problem appeared in Expressions View.

*** Bug 89716 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Fixed. It was possible for our completion processors to bail before setting 
their project context (which meant that their underlying 
CompletionProposalCollector was not created). Thus, we had no collector to 
delegate to, to retrieve an error message.

Added an error message to our completion processor hierarchy that is used to 
store local error messages for error conditions encountered before begin able 
to create a collector.

Changes to:

BreakpointConditionCompletionProcessor
CodeSnippetCompletionProcessor
DetailsCompletionProcessor
DisplayCompletionProcessor
DebugUIMessages.properties
DisplayMessages.properties
